website_summaries.verdict: A good buy if they fit your car, though some drivers may be annoyed if they experience noise and brake dust accumulation during the breaking-in period.
pros: A well-made ceramic brake pad that works quietly once broken in with no noticeable vibration
cons: Fit may be a problem, especially for some owners of older Honda models
Some dust and noise during break-in period

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit 09 Accord, quiet, low dust
customer_reviews.text: Perfect fit on front of 2009 Accord EX-L Sedan. I've used these before, and they lasted a long time with minimal brake dust. Stopping power is good, although not as strong feeling as the Raybestos EHT pads, which have a higher GG friction rating, instead of FF, these Akebono pads replaced. The only negative is Akebono doesn't include replacement caliper pad clips. These are usually included with even the cheapest pads, so I removed 1 star from value. I re-used my old clips, as they were in great condition, but new clips are cheap, and should have been included with a "ultra premium" pad set.
customer_reviews.author: Maggie

customer_reviews.title: Great Pads for Acura TL
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the front brake pads for Acura TL 2008 last week and it fits perfectly and works great. Bought extra brake grease from local auto parts store and no squeaking so far. Left the rotors as is as they only had 60K miles on them. The rotors will likely be replaced the next time. Update at 3000 miles - This week I completed 3000 miles on the new brake pads and they are holding very well. Braking is good and dust is lower than original pads. Very happy with the product so far.
customer_reviews.author: Ned

customer_reviews.title: great pads, just like OEM
customer_reviews.text: Used Centric rotors and these ProAct pads. They are quiet, have good feel, just like OEM pads. Great for a daily driver. I've even reused the rotors a few times and just did a pad slap and that works fine. No pulsating, or other brake problems. 5/11/19 Edit: Just used these pads again. Rotors were warped, put new rotors on, so also changed the pads since I was in there and everything was apart. These pads had 85,000 miles on them and were only about 60% worn. Still had 40% life left. These are the best pads you can buy for Honda/Acura vehicles in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: Heisenberg

customer_reviews.title: Great pads..no hardware
customer_reviews.text: These pads are great! Quiet, clean and has a better than OE pedal feel and stopping power. The only reason for the 4 star is these pads did not come with any metal slides. I had to reuse my old stuff. For the price of these pads, they should be including hardware.
customer_reviews.author: Drvajeep

customer_reviews.title: great replacement pads
customer_reviews.text: Had to change the rotors on my Honda Accord due to a bad vibration/shimmy under high speed braking when warm. Reading that the combination of Centric rotors and Akebono pads were good I decided to try this. The set up is great, there is no vibration only smooth quiet braking. The only extras I had to buy were brake pad spreader clips. Check the Centric website to do the proper bed in of the pads to the rotors. I usually use Honda pads but they cost more and I'm sure that Akebono is the OEM. The Amazon price was the best on the web. I recommend these pads. Make sure to grease all the pins, ears, shims.
customer_reviews.author: EC

customer_reviews.title: Work great on my 2005 Acura TL
customer_reviews.text: Work great on my 2005 Acura TL. Had them about 7 months now. Quiet, stop well and smooth. I paired them with the Hawk Performance HUS946 Quiet Slot Brake Rotor. My rotors were constantly warping, even the OEM and even drilled and slotted ones. Was using the Autozone premium pads. They lured me in with the promise of lifetime replacement (I have over 200K miles and am going for 300K). The free replacement wasn't worth it. These pads are so much superior. I don't know if the warping was caused by the pads or the rotors, but so far this combo is perfect 7 months later.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: Going strong 2 years later
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these October 27, 2011, so I have had these installed for a little over two years now. I don't remember the installation which we can say is a good thing :) I however do remember plenty of times that these brake pads have brought me to a quick and controlled stop. I installed these on a 2004 Acura TSX 6spd with no issues and they have never created any sort of noise that I have noticed and have worn very well over the course of two years all while stop-and-go driving in Atlanta. Overall, I am very happy with these brake pads and will most likely buy them again for either my Acura or the car after it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great price and Quality!
customer_reviews.text: Ordered these brake pads to replace rotor along with it. Matched these with the centric rotors. And it is a very good combo. With my Advanced auto semi metallic pads I got dust right after I cleaned the wheels. Now with my weekly washes I leave the rims alone, virtually no dust after 2 weeks of driving. I bled the brakes and I did do a standard break in procedure. The brake pedal feel isn't different or anything. But no noise no squeaks. And I did use the grease provided on the contact points. And then silicone on the back of the pads. And the price of these are to good compared to 70 bucks else where.
customer_reviews.author: SA

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: 2009 Honda Accord EX-L i4 Sedan Absolutely amazing! Replaced my front OEM pads (I will never ever go OEM with brakes again) with these in late March of this year, and they still have a lot of bite! Changed the front rotors to Wagner BD125674E in early June. I've put about 6000 miles on the pads and maybe 5700 miles on the rotors, and they're all still strong! I'll definitely buy them again!!!!...... if I'm looking for a "replacement". If I'm looking for an "upgrade", I don't think I'd get this particular set of pads.
customer_reviews.author: eilleilleT

customer_reviews.title: They turned out to be a great OEM replacement for the value
customer_reviews.text: Installed these brake pads with Centric 120.40046 premium brake rotors. They turned out to be a great OEM replacement for the value. The same as stock if not a slightly bit better. The brake dust so far appears to be minimal. Will up date in a couple thousand miles to see if brake dust increases with age.
customer_reviews.author: Jason J. Phalla

customer_reviews.title: Great product! Just ordered the rear pads
customer_reviews.text: Update: It's been 3 weeks since installation and there's been no issues. No squeaks, slippage, or fades. Take the time to install them properly using proper tools and you should be good. I love these pads and saved a ton from going to a mechanic. Cleaner and easier than changing oil! Installation was straight and forward. Been driving for a few days with no issues. Great product! Just ordered the rear pads.
customer_reviews.author: MugenTitan

customer_reviews.title: Dirty
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what some of the other reviews are talking about when they claim these pads aren't dirty. They are extremely dirty and turn my rims black in a couple of days. You'll spend three times their price on wheel cleaner. Performance is good but not cleanliness. Will look for something else next time.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Skorskovic

customer_reviews.title: Stopped squealing sounds on Honda Accord
customer_reviews.text: I had squeaky brakes on my Honda Accord 2012 that had plenty of padding left but still squealed. As soon as I replaced with akebono the squealing stopped.
customer_reviews.author: jaymm7

customer_reviews.title: The brand Scotty Kilmer reccomends on You Tube
customer_reviews.text: They had a great price, they fit my car, I pulled the trigger in order to try them in the future. According to Scotty, they are the best.
customer_reviews.author: TJH Fiddler

customer_reviews.title: Best brake pads I've ever put on a car
customer_reviews.text: Best brake pads I've ever put on a car, including some high performance types. The stopping power is noticeably increased and I swear the brake feel is also greatly improved. This is coming from stock Honda Accord pads, so maybe not saying much. In any event, I'll spring the extra few bucks for these on my other vehicles.
customer_reviews.author: momx3

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Brake Pads
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these a while ago(Front & Rear) to install on my wife's 2005 Honda Accord, I had originally replaced the set that came on the car when we bought it new with top of the line Wagner's from Advance Auto, and although they worked they were also noisy and literately cut deep grooves in both the front and rear rotors. These pads on the other hand are the same brand that originally come on our Accord and are nice and quiet and stop real smooth.
customer_reviews.author: Buck Wheat

customer_reviews.title: Good brakes oem quality.
customer_reviews.text: The Akebono ACT787 seems to stop just as well as my OEM brakes and maybe a little better. Very close in performance which is very good. Low fading effect when riding brakes down a mountain. Brake dust is heavy at first, but seems to have subsided. No complaints.
customer_reviews.author: Wordsend

customer_reviews.title: Much better initial bite than the pads that were on my ...
customer_reviews.text: Much better initial bite than the pads that were on my 2012 Accord when I purchased it (I bought it used with 30k miles, so I assume the stock pads were still in place.) Braking is now achieved with less effort, giving me more confidence in aggressive driving and emergency braking.
customer_reviews.author: J. R. K.

customer_reviews.title: Missing hardware
customer_reviews.text: The box is opened not sure parts ares used no hardware kits and lube smeared in the box
customer_reviews.author: Elveda Yildirim

customer_reviews.title: Superb quality - correct for my 2008 Accord EX 4 cylinder (front)
customer_reviews.text: These were the exact correct pads for my 2008 Honda Accord EX 4 cylinder ! ACT787 with 4 wheel disc brakes. These fit the front. Didn't come with any extra hardware like the clips but I just reused the old ones they were in good shape
customer_reviews.author: D. Thornton

customer_reviews.title: Brake Pads
customer_reviews.text: Installed on a Honda Coupe. No noise and little dust .
customer_reviews.author: TASTELISS

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product! Love the feel and was super easy to install. I've had them on now for 2 weeks and couldn't be any happier with these brakes. I have a 2007 Acura TL base model and love them! Excellent product and will definitely buy again for next set of brakes.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: These are very clean and fade resistant when hot.
customer_reviews.text: Put these on a Accord and also changed out the rear pads near the same time, but the rears were a different brand due to availability. These are very clean and fade resistant when hot. Same mileage, the rears have 3-4 times a much dust on the wheels.
customer_reviews.author: Cape Winds

customer_reviews.title: Very Silent
customer_reviews.text: These pads are very good, they don’t make any sound at all.
customer_reviews.author: Mario S.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Great set of brakes pad. I had them on my vehicle now for about two weeks and they provided great stopping power. I just ordered another set for the rear. Nice product for the price and good quality.
customer_reviews.author: Tech2guys

customer_reviews.title: Very Good
customer_reviews.text: Have had these on my TSX for almost 4 years now. Work great. Very quiet, never any squealing. Reasonable amount of brake dust.
customer_reviews.author: D.K.

customer_reviews.title: Noise free.. And great stopping power!
customer_reviews.text: Wow. Installed these today and they are amazing. Perfectly quiet and powerful to bring my Accord v6 to a slow/ stop in an instant. Will re-update in a while after more use
customer_reviews.author: Mahlan

customer_reviews.title: Akebono ACT787 ProAct Ultra-Premium Ceramic Brake Pad Set
customer_reviews.text: These are very high quality - I was surprised. They are ACTUALLY MADE IN THE USA. They are legit.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Very good breaks.
customer_reviews.text: Possibly my favorite part of these brakes are very little to no brake dust. I will always buy these for my Honda.
customer_reviews.author: M. L. Elan

customer_reviews.title: Almost Dust Free!
customer_reviews.text: These pads run almost dust free! I had to do the rear brakes on my car and installed a competing brand, purchased locally, supposedly OEM equivalent. If it wasn't for the expense I would have swapped out the Lakew*** pads and installed the Akebono's. The difference in dust on the wheels and calipers is unbelievable, virtually non existent with the Akebono ceramic pads. They are quiet and do not appear to be too aggressive on the rotors.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis T

customer_reviews.title: Great pads!
customer_reviews.text: These feel real similar to OEM pads and I am very hard on pads. The rotors are still smooth after hard braking and so far they seem to last good. I am known to wear out pads in 6 months and I think these will last a full year! Will buy again. Also initial bite is very good and grabby just like OEM.
customer_reviews.author: Jamal Thomas

customer_reviews.title: Just perfect!
customer_reviews.text: Highly recommending this brake pad replacement set for the Acura TL '06! Produce no noise! Pair this with the Centric 120.40046 Premium Brake Rotor here on Amazon and you will be set! Perfect!
customer_reviews.author: Nam

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Installed without any problem. Will know after couple of months use how they really work.
customer_reviews.author: handtowork

customer_reviews.title: I put these in my Honda and am very happy with them
customer_reviews.text: I put these in my Honda and am very happy with them. They replaced some warped rotors and these feel exceptionally smooth even on hard stops. I haven't had them in long enough to provide a review on longevity or brake dust but you can leave a comment a year or two from now and I'll respond.
customer_reviews.author: W. Lee

customer_reviews.title: Will they last 196K miles like my OEM front pads
customer_reviews.text: Soon to be installed on my 2006 Honda Accord.. Will they last 196K miles like my OEM front pads? I hope so.
customer_reviews.author: Leon Clancy

customer_reviews.title: One of the best brake pads
customer_reviews.text: One of the best brake pad brands on the market, clean, smooth stopping, great longevity...
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Fix it !!

customer_reviews.title: these are of high quality !
customer_reviews.text: these pads are of high quality very quiet you still need to use brake grease on the back and the hinges and the shim is nice and thick so no failing there ( i have had that part fail on cheaper pads ) i like these pads a lot and will use these from now on .
customer_reviews.author: tomster

customer_reviews.title: SAY NO! It squeak very bad
customer_reviews.text: First week I put it on it was great but the week went on the brake pads started to break in. The brake pad squeak like hell and stopping was decent but I would not recommend it because of the sound it make.
customer_reviews.author: Vien Lim

customer_reviews.title: No compalints here after a couple thousand miles. They ...
customer_reviews.text: No compalints here after a couple thousand miles. They came with the shim physically installed, so I didn't have to try to reuse an old rusted shim. They don't provide much grease but you can get that anywhere. No noise, and I haven't noticed any build up of dust.
customer_reviews.author: brian0918

customer_reviews.title: Great for My 2009 Accord!
customer_reviews.text: Great set of brake pads. Installation was a breeze and all of the components we in the box to complete the repair. The feel of the pads when stopping are more than adequate and make the 2009 accord 4 cylinder like new again.
customer_reviews.author: K. Gobble

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with these pads
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with these pads. Very little dust. Very quiet and smooth breaking power. Will buy these same pads when they wear out. Excellent product and timely delivery.
customer_reviews.author: Happy Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommended ceramic brake pads
customer_reviews.text: Installed these on my wife’s Honda Accord and very happy. Real stopping power that you feel right away!
customer_reviews.author: Rex

customer_reviews.title: Fit great on accord 09 EX
customer_reviews.text: Replaced the pads on a Honda Accord 2009 EX. Doesn't come with any additional hardware except for the shims on the back of the pads.
customer_reviews.author: marnat

customer_reviews.title: False Advertising
customer_reviews.text: False advertising this says it fits 2011 ford explorer and it does not. Money down the drain and I'm stuck with brakes I can't use.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Brakes made a bad squealing noise after 2-3 weeks
customer_reviews.text: Brakes made a bad squealing noise after 2-3 weeks. Returned the pads to the shipper but they are saying they never received them, so I lost out on the brake pads and the refund. Bad experience all around.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Definitely A Premium Pad
customer_reviews.text: After investigating Akebono I found that they are the manufacturer for the Carquest branded top of the line pad and this is one of the top brands at Advance Auto. Its a really nice looking pad from a manufacturing stand point. I've been using these pads for over 6 months and don't have any noise or brake dust. The best part is that they are manufactured in the US.
customer_reviews.author: andstep

customer_reviews.title: Great stopping, no noise
customer_reviews.text: Great stopping, no noise, normal dusting. Paired with theon the 2006 Acura TSX equals great braking power.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Better than OEM
customer_reviews.text: Akebono pads always gives you a great brake feel. Been a loyal buyer for over twenty years.
customer_reviews.author: Felix L Santiago

customer_reviews.title: Slightly less bite, but no dust. Works for me...
customer_reviews.text: Lightly less initial bite than oem but no brake dust and decnt life. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Works great.
customer_reviews.text: Working great so far. I currently plan to using these in the future.
customer_reviews.author: Cj Johnson

customer_reviews.title: great replacement for the dirty organic pads - stop just ...
customer_reviews.text: great replacement for the dirty organic pads - stop just as well without all the messy dust of the organic pads
customer_reviews.author: CJM

customer_reviews.title: Excellent
customer_reviews.text: Perfect for the 2009 Honda Civic FD1 JAPAN DOMESTIC MARKET. Excellent product, very, very high quality. I will only use this brand from now. I am delighted by my purchase. Just make sure that the product corresponds to the version Civic you are looking for. This will not work on US 8 Gen Civics, only JDM.
customer_reviews.author: Cherinne T. Singh

customer_reviews.title: Well worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Perfect brake pad for my TL. Smooth fast braking, low dust, no squeaking.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great pads, can't go wrong with them
customer_reviews.text: Great pads, can't go wrong with them. Just make sure you don't get slotted discs because they will squeak with slotted disc ( My experience with my other car). These were perfect fit for my 2008 Honda Accord EX L.
customer_reviews.author: Georj

customer_reviews.title: Brake Pads Work Great
customer_reviews.text: I received these brake pads from Amazon promptly and there were exactly the right pad for my Honda Accord. It was relatively easy to figure out which model to order. The instructions to install them were helpful, but very brief - not as easy to understand as I had hope for. However, installation went smoothly (note: I've installed brake pads many times before, so it might not go so smoothly for a novice). Now to the bottom line: the brake pads work great! They seem to be much smoother and more linear in response to brake pedal pressure than the original Honda brake pads. I recommend them.
customer_reviews.author: JimBo

customer_reviews.title: fit perfect. i've had them on for 5 days now ...
customer_reviews.text: put these on my 2006 acura tl base with nav. fit perfect. i've had them on for 5 days now and they are quiet and good stopping power. not sure about brake dust yet.
customer_reviews.author: AM

customer_reviews.title: Great for 2008 Accord EX
customer_reviews.text: These are front brake pad set. They fit our 2008 Honda Accord EX perfectly. They are great ceramic pads for far less than you would usually pay. No squeaking or adjusting needed.
customer_reviews.author: C.A.

customer_reviews.title: i love these brakes
customer_reviews.text: i love these brakes. very responsive. it's a little squeaky when it's still new. other than, i'll definitely buy it again
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: top of the line premium brakes
customer_reviews.text: i get the "used" ones (same as new and much cheaper) . these are top of the line brakes and work great.
customer_reviews.author: rdmjr

customer_reviews.title: Great Pads
customer_reviews.text: These FRONT pads fit my '09 Accord V6 perfectly. Akebono makes great stuff! The vendor I bought these from has great prices and they ship extremely FAST!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit for my 2007 Accord
customer_reviews.text: These brake pads fit my 07 accord v6 perfectly, and they are easy to install. They seem to be of superior quality versus the store bought pads at other auto parts stores. Plus, I got a great deal thanks to Amazon. Thanks Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: S. Freudenberg

customer_reviews.title: Installed these along with new rotors on my 2006 Acura ...
customer_reviews.text: Installed these along with new rotors on my 2006 Acura TSX. So far no problems. My car feels new again.
customer_reviews.author: Rascoe1982

customer_reviews.title: I've only put several hundred miles on them but they're better than factory so far
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely silent braking and very little dust. I've only put several hundred miles on them but they're better than factory so far. 2010 accord coupe v6
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey

customer_reviews.title: Decent pads
customer_reviews.text: Put them on my acura tl and they do great so far. Only complaint is for the price, they should have included retaining clips and boots
customer_reviews.author: Dakota Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Happy with product
customer_reviews.text: What I was expecting. They are quieter! Also noticed not as much brake dust as others I’ve used in the past !
customer_reviews.author: james taylor

customer_reviews.title: Very Smooth Braking
customer_reviews.text: I purchased a pair to replace the front pads on my 06 TL. The braking using these Akebono pads give a very smooth yet firm pedal feel. And has much faster/better stoping power. Overall much better feeling and braking over the OEM pads.
customer_reviews.author: B. Gonzalez

customer_reviews.title: Nice smooth and quiet
customer_reviews.text: These have a very smooth pedal feel and are very quiet. Brake dust isn't that bad either but I drive a manual car so I'm not always on the brakes like all the automatic drivers :-P
customer_reviews.author: Sev

customer_reviews.title: Great Brake pads
customer_reviews.text: These are really good brake pads with good stopping power. The small issue I had with these were putting them on as they are a little thick and the grease they provide is not enough. There is no brake dust with these! They don't even squeal in the rain.
customer_reviews.author: Mohit

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: They seem fine. Not as much dust as regular cheap pads.
customer_reviews.author: Phatty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great brake pads received on time and have a good bite.

customer_reviews.title: ... about 2-3 months ago and they have been working great.
customer_reviews.text: Placed these on my Honda Accord about 2-3 months ago and they have been working great.

customer_reviews.title: 2010 Accord EX Perfect fit and work great!
customer_reviews.text: Recently bought these along with new rotors (Centric 120.40046) These fit my 2010 Accord EX sedan perfect. I have used Akebono in the past and they are a good quality brand. Definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Aaron

customer_reviews.title: Outstanding quality and Price
customer_reviews.text: I have been using Akebono for the past 10+ years. Both my front and rear brakes are Akebono ceramic pad set. Love these pads Amazon + Akebono = Winning combination on quality and Service

customer_reviews.title: Great performance
customer_reviews.text: Performs flawlessly. Quiet, precise braking on Acura 2002 TL. Very satisfied and will purchase these Akebono Ultra-Premium brake pads again.

customer_reviews.text: Clean braking for the most part with minor vibration when at higher speed. Emergency braking is good

customer_reviews.text: These pads fit the front end of my 08 Acura TSX. Paired with ACT537 in the rear. Noticeable performance improvement over OEM pads.

customer_reviews.text: shipped fine. fit 2007 tsx fine. driving for a week now. no complaints. would buy again. Mechanic also has no complaints

customer_reviews.text: These brakes are quiet and do a very good job of stopping

customer_reviews.text: Bought same Centric rotor, Akebono pad combo for our CRV and Accord. excellent performance on both.

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: Installed on 09 Accord a while back and installation went well and no issues to date.

customer_reviews.title: great brakes
customer_reviews.text: bought the wrong style for my car but exchanged the akebono for the right fit for my mitshubishi lancer and there is no noise and smooth braking
customer_reviews.author: Jeff

customer_reviews.title: They are good but I will not buy again.
customer_reviews.text: I waited about a year before writing this review. If I had written it within the first month of my brakes being installed, I would have given them 1 star. They smelled awful, like burning, like fire. I had to drive my car like an over cautious snail for about 2 months to get that horrendous, vile odor to wear off. With that being said, once the smell was gone- I consider these brakes to be very good, not the best ever, but very good- I like them. I would not buy them again because that initial smell of whatever was on the brake pad was unbearable for me.
customer_reviews.author: BooBooKitty

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: love these pads i have them on all my cars
customer_reviews.author: Bestbuyshunter

customer_reviews.title: Very good product (Brand) it fits perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Very good product (Brand) it fits perfectly. Put it on for 6 months now, I think it better than original one from honda.
customer_reviews.author: Vu

customer_reviews.title: They are great. They last longer the OEM pads and they ...
customer_reviews.text: I have these on 3 vehicles. They are great. They last longer the OEM pads and they don't make dust.
customer_reviews.author: KJ

customer_reviews.title: Very good break pad
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my 07 Acura TSX to replace the OEM pads. I've been impressed with these pads as they have outperform the OEM pads in every aspect, performance, noise and dust. They feel more responsive and progressive while breaking in all situations so far.
customer_reviews.author: kacxx00

customer_reviews.title: Does not fit Civic 2007
customer_reviews.text: Doesn't fit the 2007 Honda Civic Sedan, EX model. Other than that, nice pads. The ones ordered for the rear brakes (selected by the vehicle selector on Amazon) are the correct model, just not these for the fronts.
customer_reviews.author: Henry C.

customer_reviews.title: Nice stopping power, low dust
customer_reviews.text: These pads are an improvement on the OEM pads that came on our TSX. Good grip on breaking with much less dust buildup. No noise from them although I used the Permatex 24124 Ceramic Extreme Brake Parts Lubricant rather than the included grease that came with the linings. They also include new backing plates. I think these are about as good as the Hawk pads. Both are good choices for a step up from OEM pads and will not leave the rims black like the OEM pads.
customer_reviews.author: jray

customer_reviews.title: Great Pads
customer_reviews.text: As advertised, no break in period needed. Great performance and no squealing!
customer_reviews.author: js

customer_reviews.title: Excellent brakepads
customer_reviews.text: Excellent brakepads. No noise & very quiet. Highly recommend ..
customer_reviews.author: Matino

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: Took just a couple hours to change my brake pads, so far no complaints at all. My brakes work way better, and they're completely silent now.

customer_reviews.title: Makes the rims really dirty

customer_reviews.text: Been using these for a couple of years now, great products, much better than OEMs.
customer_reviews.author: Ahmed Mahboob

customer_reviews.title: very quiet.
customer_reviews.text: Put them on a 2010 Honda Accord Love the new pads, I bedded them this weekend and drove them to work today 40 miles, into Atlanta GA. They are super quiet and feel smooth, kinda like new brakes (sarcasm), I also paired them with the Centric Premium Rotors and it is nice not to have brakes that shudder and pulse every time you use them. I bedded them in and they are great so far, I will get back with longevity.
customer_reviews.author: Papa and Mama Bear

customer_reviews.title: I bought these with Centric Parts premium rotors. So ...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these with Centric Parts premium rotors. So far, stopping is smooth, quiet, and consistent, and there is very little brake dust.

customer_reviews.text: These are very quiet and very smooth brake pads. Well worth the money spent for the premium pads. I'm using them for all four wheels.

product_meta.title: Akebono ACT787 ProACT Ultra-Premium Ceramic Brake Pad Set (Engineering #ACT564)
product_meta.description:
Proact Ultra Premium Ceramic Disc Brake Pad kit

AMAZON.COM


Engineered to precise Original Equipment (OE) standards, Akebono ProACT Ultra-Premium ceramic brake pads provide the ultimate braking experience suitable for the vast majority of motorists. Designed using vehicle-optimized friction formulations aimed at eliminating noise, vibration and harshness (NVH) and severely limiting wheel dust, while increasing durability and smooth braking events, they are the best replacement for restoring OE ceramic pad performance, as well as upgrading from conventional pads.  


View larger. 
View larger. 
View larger. Ultimate Performance with OE Quality
Cruising along the interstate, creeping through rush hour traffic or navigating through your neighborhood, you count on your brakes to stop your vehicle every time with smooth, quiet assurance. Why possibly compromise braking performance just because it is time to replace your Brake Pads? Today, motorists have an option to restore OE performance.  Akebono Pro-ACT Ultra Premium ceramic brake pads are the aftermarket's only OE validated, application-specific friction formulations. Akebono knows the precise definition of OE-Quality as determined by the Original Equipment Manufacturers, because Akebono bids on all vehicle platforms and models years in North America. In addition to dramatically quieter braking, Pro-ACT Ceramic Pads provide best-in-class braking performance, including enhanced initial effectiveness (no break-in required), high resistance to fade, consistent brake pedal feel and ultra-low dusting for cleaner wheels and tires. Ceramic technology also causes minimal wear on brake rotors. Taken together these factors guarantee that Akebono's Pro-ACT Ultra Premium brake pads provide the ultimate braking experience-reaching new performance levels or better. 

 Akebono's Research & Development
Being the largest brake manufacturer in the world gives Akebono a unique advantage: an exclusive Original Equipment experience and expertise backed by the most comprehensive Research & Development in the industry. That fierce pursuit of unfailing quality and safety assures that Akebono continues to be the innovating leader of braking technology. 

 Key Features: 

 * Ultra-Quiet - Akebono has developed an extensive variety of unique Pro-ACT Ceramic formulations to reduce and/or virtually eliminate brake squealing, groaning and vibration.
 * Enhanced Durability - For the vast majority of motorists, Pro-ACT Ultra-Premium brake pads provide significantly improved pad wear performance in normal driving conditions compared to traditional brake pads. This means longer times between brake jobs.
 * Low Dusting - The carefully selected materials found in Pro-ACT Ultra-Premium brake pads are more compatible with today's popular aluminum, open-wheel designs. They help minimize and/or virtually eliminate dusting.
 * Smooth Braking - Pro-ACT Ultra-Premium brake pads provide more consistent, smooth stopping power over a wide range of driving conditions, including panic stops.
 * Vehicle-Optimized Formulations - Pro-ACT Ultra-Premium brake pads are formulated to meet the specific OE quality, fit and performance requirements for your vehicle. More than 400 pads are available for virtually every domestic, Japanese and European car and truck built since 1990.
 * Braking Expertise You Can Trust - Akebono has more than 75 years of braking expertise, is the largest OEM friction pad supplier and is the originator of ceramic pad technology.

What's in the Box
4-Akebono ProACT Ultra-Premium ceramic brake pads.  About Akebono
Akebono was established in Japan in 1929, at a time when the Japanese automobile industry had only produced 400 vehicles. Since then, keeping pace with the onset of motorization, Akebono has entered the domestic and overseas markets as brake experts. Committed to precision, Akebono refuses to cut corners on safety and will only implement best practices in their operations. This time-tested approach has resulted in proven quality control techniques that guarantee minimal process variation in all phases of production. Embraced throughout the organization, this approach enables the company to consistently achieve nearly zero defects per million parts produced.
feature_bullets: Model ACT787 comes stamped with engineering number ACT564
Ultimate upgrade for OE semi-metallic, organic and low-metallic brake pads
Ultra-Quiet - controls noise, vibration and harshness levels
Superior initial effectiveness with no required break-in period
Extremely rotor friendly for longer rotor life
Vehicle optimized ceramic formula for superior performance
